original_text: God has given her linen clothes to wear that are bright and clean.’ These special linen clothes show the good things that God's holy people have done. 19: God's people are clean and pure because Jesus, the Lamb, died in their place as a sacrifice. God has given her linen clothes to wear that are bright and clean.’
